short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Complete a daily quiz to browse websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Increase your productivity by completing a daily quiz.

Daily Quiz forces you to complete a quiz daily ( or until you close your browser ), to browse any website. 

--- 
Most Recent Update: ( v1.0.1 )
- added dark theme to block page
- restructure codebase
- add an options menu that allows user to set a custom time
